description: From Latin ballista (“a military siege engine for throwing stones”)  +‎ -ic.

adjectives.description: ballistic (comparative more ballistic, superlative most ballistic)

entries.meaning: (not comparable) Of or relating to ballistics.
(comparable) Of or relating to projectiles moving under their own momentum, aerodynamic drag, gravity, and sometimes rocket power, without significant lift.

examples: When he heard him lie about it, he went ballistic.
